nodes.text: The Sith scientist Vul Isen worked out of a laboratory on the planet Daluuj during the Second Imperial Civil War. He vacated it before 138 ABY. When the crew of the pirate ship Mynock came to Daluuj with an eye to assassinate him, they found the laboratory abandoned. After doing battle with a contingent of Sith and Imperial stormtroopers stationed there, they set explosives and destroyed the laboratory.
